mean_cn: adj. 疏忽的，粗心大意的
mean_en: (law or formal) failing to give somebody/something enough care or attention, especially when this has serious results
sentence: The worker was negligent in smoking cigarette with barrels of oil around him.
sentence_trans: 这个工人很粗心，在周围都是油桶的情况下抽烟。
word_etyma: neg没有 + lig选择，收集 + ent…的 → 没有选择的 → 疏忽的，忽视的
